notAuthorized: {name} not authorize to take this action.

auth.forceLogout: Some other user login this account on other device.

user.passwordMatch: Password must contain at least four letters, including at least one uppercase letter, and four digits.
user.confirmPasswordNotMatch: Password and confirm password did not match.
user.userExist: User already exist on given user name.
user.blockCantAccess: You can not unblock this user.
user.lock/unlockSuccessfully: User lock and unlock operation successfull.
user.blocked: There is something wrong with your account. Please contact your administrator.

race.betAlreadyExistForMatch: Bet already exist for this race.
race.maxMustBeGreater: Max bet must be greater than min bet.
race.atLeastOneBookmaker: Please create at least one bookmaker.
race.matchAddFail: Race add operation failed due to invalid data.

match.betAlreadyExistForMatch: Bet already exist for this match.
match.maxMustBeGreater: Max bet must be greater than min bet.
match.atLeastOneBookmaker: Please create at least one bookmaker.
match.matchAddFail: Match add operation failed due to invalid data.

bet.resultDuplicate: You cannot declare result multiple times
bet.resultReject: Your result has been rejected because of difference in result.
bet.resultApprove: Your result has been saved but need to be approve by other expert.
bet.sessionAllResult: Please declare all session result first.
bet.resultDeclareOrProgress: Result is already declare or inprogress.
bet.declareOtherMarket: Please declare all other market results.
bet.matchAlreadyDeclared: You can not undeclare this market as match result is already declared.
